message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can negotiate further if you want to, but remember inflation hits us both eventually!
Let's split this more evenly. I propose we each take half, with me getting a slight edge to account for the inflation. We can work out the details later, but I believe this is a fair starting point.

I'm willing to compromise, but I'm still feeling the effects of inflation.  Let's split 60/40, with me taking the larger share to compensate.  I'm open to further discussion, but I don't want to lose too much more value.
